cause.description:
sharif attia, lothario extraordinaire, hiding behind a mask of impenetrability as the architect with a symbol of a question mark, in fact he's considered the batman of architecture, battling to protect the earth from grotesque earth-rape (hellloooooo dubai!)
1. Sharif must show his face
2. And he must shave his legs regularly
3. and stop eating fasolia daily
cause.mission: constantly deface sharif's wall until he puts his pic on his profile and acts funky porcini
cause.name: Sharif Attia: pimp my profile!
